title: Quests
content: eir individual story will advance if you complete these quests. Completing these quests will also grant you rewards, experience, and you will also loot a lot of new equipment during the exploration and battles that are require to complete them. These quests are not required for the completion of the main story of the game. Companion Quests by Companion Shadowheart Daughter of Darkness The Chosen of Shar A Familiar Face Astarion The Pale Elf Gale The Wizard of Waterdeep In Case of Death... Baltha
